section.p: After successfully calling to implement the callback in and calling to enable audio spectrum monitoring, the SDK triggers this callback at the interval you set to report the spectrum of received remote audio data.

After successfully calling , implementing the callback of , and enabling audio spectrum monitoring via , the SDK triggers this callback at the set interval to report the received remote audio spectrum data.

After successfully calling to implement the callback in and calling to enable audio spectrum monitoring, the SDK triggers this callback at the set time interval to report the spectrum of the received remote audio data.

After successfully calling , implementing the callback in , and calling to enable audio spectrum monitoring, the SDK triggers this callback at the interval you set to report the spectrum of received remote audio data.

plentry.pd: The audio spectrum information of remote users. See . The number of elements in the array equals the number of remote users monitored by the SDK. An empty array indicates no remote user audio spectrum is detected.
The audio spectrum information of remote users. See . The array size equals the number of remote users detected by the SDK. An empty array indicates no remote audio spectrum was detected.

The audio spectrum information of remote users. See . The number of elements in the array equals the number of remote users detected by the SDK. An empty array means no remote audio spectrum is detected.
Audio spectrum information of remote users. See . The array size equals the number of remote users detected by the SDK. An empty array indicates no remote user audio spectrum was detected.

section.title: Return Values
section.p:
Whether to receive spectrum data:
: Receive.
: Do not receive.
